Sentencas: To decrease the deactivation of the Ni/YSZ electrode during hydrocarbon oxidation in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and coelectrolysis of H2O and CO2 in a solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC), it is very important to first understand oxygen vacancy formation at the triple-phase boundary (TPB) of Ni/YSZ because such vacancies are the active sites for coke formation and sulfur poisoning.
Titulo: Elucidating the Role of the Electric Field at the Ni/YSZ Electrode: A DFT Study

Sentencas: Furthermore, the effect of the electric fields on oxygen vacancy formation must be investigated because such fields could potentially be used to alter the Ni/YSZ system and directly modify its.
Titulo: Elucidating the Role of the Electric Field at the Ni/YSZ Electrode: A DFT Study
Elucidating the Role of the Electric Field at the Ni/YSZ Electrode: A DFT Study

Sentencas: In this study, three scenarios were considered: (i) oxygen vacancy formation in YSZ with and-without a Ni duster, (ii)
Titulo: Elucidating the Role of the Electric Field at the Ni/YSZ Electrode: A DFT Study

Sentencas: oxygen vacancy formation and oxygen diffusion in YSZ and Ni/YSZ at different oxygen vacancy concentrations, and (iii) the effect of the electric fields on scenarios (i) and (ii).
Titulo: Elucidating the Role of the Electric Field at the Ni/YSZ Electrode: A DFT Study

Sentencas: Our computational results show that the oxygen-enriched Ni/YSZ (Ni/YSZ+O) electrode is most likely to occur in an oxygen-enriched environment, even in the presence of different electric fields.
Titulo: Elucidating the Role of the Electric Field at the Ni/YSZ Electrode: A DFT Study

Sentencas: Both large negative and positive electric fields could lead to more active TPB vacancies by reducing the vacancy formation energies of the Ni/YSZ+O electrode to a certain degree.
Titulo: Elucidating the Role of the Electric Field at the Ni/YSZ Electrode: A DFT Study

Sentencas: Both charge distribution and effective dipole moments verify the qualitative findings concerning field influences on oxygen vacancy formation in Ni/YSZ.
Titulo: Elucidating the Role of the Electric Field at the Ni/YSZ Electrode: A DFT Study

Sentencas: Overall, this investigation provides guidance for designing a Ni/YSZ electrode with an improved electrocatalytic performance via the simulated electric fields.
Titulo: Elucidating the Role of the Electric Field at the Ni/YSZ Electrode: A DFT Study
